name: Jumpy Lil Fish: A Bird Hopping Game - by Cobalt Play Games
name_original: Jumpy Lil Fish: A Bird Hopping Game - by Cobalt Play Games
description:
DOWNLOAD IT TODAY FOR FREE!! - Jumpy Lil Fish : A Bird Hopping Game.
Cyrus has always dreamed of flying, but he can't, he's only a fish. One day he decides to be brave and jump out of the water like a frog and hop on to the backs of birds to fly. Help him be the hoppy king and live his dreams.

WHAT PLAYERS ARE SAYING
- "Haha, I keep tapping the 1 jump instead of the 2 jump at the wrong time, it really gets your thinking. wrecking my brain :p " - hoppy gal - Feb 2 2014

- "This is cool. simple, easy to learn, giving it a big thumbs up and 5 stars" - le star jack - Feb 3 2014

FEATURES
- Great retro style art and sound.
- Keep your top score for competition with friends.
- Super addictive game play.
- Perfect for kids and adults.

Show your support by rating Jumpy Lil Fish : A Bird Hopping Game.
